author: jbonofre
msg: Downgrade Jetty version as other SMX modules still use Jetty 6.1.22.
You should upgrade to 6.1.25 which fixes issue around Jetty performances.

author: cmpilato
msg: Teach svnperms.py to handle nested groups (though with no forward
(Permission.parse_groups): Interpret tokens in a group's definition
that begin with '@' as group names, and recursively expand that
Tweak the sample to demonstrate this new nested group business.
